name: styr
description: Electron app with React and TypeScript

scripts.dev: NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run dev:vite" "npm run dev:electron"
scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && vite build && npm run build:electron
scripts.build:electron: tsc src/main.ts --outDir dist --module ESNext --target ESNext --moduleResolution bundler --esModuleInterop --allowImportingTsExtensions false --skipLibCheck true
